API Reference¶

Public API¶

class mdkv.MDKVDocument(title, authors, created, version='0.1', tracks=<factory>, metadata=<factory>)¶

Bases: object

In-memory representation of a .mdkv document.

Includes metadata and a mapping of track_id → Track.

add_track(track)¶

Add a new track.

Raises ValidationError if track_id already exists.

Return type:

None

authors: List[str]¶
created: datetime¶
find_tracks_by_type(track_type)¶

Return all tracks with the given track_type.

Return type:

List[Track]

get_metadata(key, default=None)¶

Get a metadata value or default if missing.

Return type:

str | None

get_track(track_id)¶

Return track by id or None if missing.

Return type:

Track | None

list_languages()¶

Return sorted list of languages present across tracks (excluding None).

Return type:

List[str]

metadata: Dict[str, str]¶
remove_metadata(key)¶

Remove a metadata key if present.

Return type:

None

remove_track(track_id)¶

Remove and return a track by id.

Raises KeyError if missing.

Return type:

Track

rename_track(old_id, new_id)¶

Rename old_id to new_id and adjust its path if it targets a .md file.

Raises ValueError if new_id exists or KeyError if old_id missing.

Return type:

None

set_metadata(key, value)¶

Set or replace a metadata key/value pair.

Return type:

None

title: str¶
tracks: Dict[str, Track]¶
update_track_content(track_id, new_content)¶

Replace the Markdown content of the track track_id.

Raises KeyError if missing.

Return type:

None

version: str = '0.1'¶
class mdkv.SearchMatch(track_id, start, end, extract)¶

Bases: object

end: int¶
extract: str¶
start: int¶
track_id: str¶
class mdkv.Track(track_id, track_type, language, path, content)¶

Bases: object

A single Markdown content track within a document.

Fields: - track_id: unique identifier within the document - track_type: one of allowed_track_types() - language: ISO 639-1/BCP-47 code or None for non-linguistic tracks - path: path inside the container (must start with tracks/) - content: UTF-8 Markdown text

content: str¶
language: Optional[str]¶
path: str¶
track_id: str¶
track_type: str¶
exception mdkv.ValidationError¶

Bases: Exception

Raised when MDKV document or track validation fails.

class mdkv.ValidationIssue(level, message)¶

Bases: object

level: str¶
message: str¶
mdkv.allowed_track_types()¶

Return the list of supported track type identifiers.

Order is informational only; callers should not rely on ordering.

Return type:

List[str]

mdkv.export_to_files(doc, output_dir, include_track_types=None)¶

Write track contents to individual .md files in output_dir.

Filenames are derived from track_id.

Return type:

None

mdkv.load_mdkv(input_path)¶

Load a .mdkv document from input_path.

Raises KeyError/yaml.YAMLError if the manifest is missing/invalid.

Return type:

MDKVDocument

mdkv.save_mdkv(doc, output_path)¶

Write doc to output_path as a .mdkv ZIP container.

Overwrites existing files. Creates parent directories as needed.

Return type:

None

mdkv.search_document(doc, pattern, flags=0, track_types=None, languages=None)¶

Search doc for pattern. :rtype: List[SearchMatch]

  • track_types: optional subset filter (e.g. [“primary”, “commentary”])

  • languages: optional subset filter (e.g. [“en”, “es”])

Returns a list of SearchMatch with small surrounding extracts.

mdkv.to_html(doc)¶

Render HTML for the primary track of doc.

Return type:

str

mdkv.to_markdown(doc, include_track_types=None)¶

Render doc to Markdown.

If include_track_types is provided, only those track types are exported. Each track is prefixed with a lightweight HTML comment header encoding metadata for round-trip compatibility.

Return type:

str

mdkv.validate_document(doc)¶

Validate required fields and presence of a primary track.

Returns a list of issues and raises ValidationError if any ERRORs exist.

Return type:

List[ValidationIssue]
